TextEng: Just little kobolds? You're going to die, vermin!
Why not? This should be a fun little sport!
Text: 왜 안 되겠어? 재미있는 오락거리가 되겠군!

TextEng: You're evil little monsters and you deserve to die!!
Text: 너희는 사악한 꼬마 괴물이고 죽어 마땅해!!

TextEng: And what about the defenseless people in Hilltop? This is justice!!
Text: 힐탑의 무방비한 사람들은 어쩌고? 이건 정의야!!

TextEng: So give me one good reason why I shouldn't.
Text: 그러니까 안 될 이유 하나만 대봐.

TextEng: Then run, and don't stop running. I don't want to see you ever again!
Text: 그럼 뛰어, 멈추지 말고 계속 뛰어. 다시는 보고 싶지 않아!

TextEng: Then answer some of my questions, and be quick about it.
Alright, go on. Get out of here, all of you.
I want some questions answered first.
Nothing, never mind.
Forget it! Now you die!
No! Now you pay for what you did in Hilltop!
Text: 안 돼! 힐탑에서 한 짓의 대가를 치러라!

TextEng: Do you kobolds know how to fight?
Oh, no reason...
I just wanted to know how easy it'll be to kill you all.
Text: 너희 모두를 죽이기가 얼마나 쉬울지 알고 싶었을 뿐이야.

TextEng: I think you should help me fight the gnolls.
Text: 놀들과 싸우는 걸 도와야 할 것 같은데.

TextEng: True. I suppose I don't need your help after all.
Text: 맞아. 결국 네 도움은 필요 없을 것 같군.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> You fight them or you fight me. Make your choice.
That's not justice for Hilltop... but killing you will be.
Text: 그건 힐탑에 대한 정의가 아니야... 하지만 널 죽이는 건 정의지.

TextEng: No, I'd much rather kill you now.
No, I don't trust you. Best you kobolds just get out of here now.
Text: 아니, 믿을 수 없어. 너희 코볼트들은 지금 당장 여기서 나가는 게 좋을 거야.

TextEng: Very well. You help me fight the chieftain and you live.
Text: 좋아. 족장과 싸우는 걸 도우면 살려준다.

TextEng: And where are you going to get weapons?
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> I'd think you'd want to make up for what you did at Hilltop...
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 힐탑에서 한 짓을 보상하고 싶을 거라고 생각했는데...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Don't you want to fight back? You just need to help me.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 반격하고 싶지 않아? 나만 도와주면 돼.

TextEng: Then it's time for you to die!
Do you know anything about someone named J'Nah?
Text: 즈나라는 사람에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: What do you know about these gnolls?
What else?
Who are you and how did you get here?
Text: 넌 누구고 어떻게 여기 온 거야?

TextEng: I don't have any more questions for you.
You attacked Hilltop?! The gnolls are the least of your worries, kobold!!
Text: 힐탑을 공격했다고?! 놀들은 네 걱정거리 중 가장 작은 거야, 코볼트!!

TextEng: You were part of the raid on Hilltop?
I want to ask you something else.
You're going to pay for what you did, kobold!
Text: 네가 한 짓의 대가를 치르게 될 거야, 코볼트!

TextEng: What kind of poison did you use on Drogan?
What happened to Drogan's artifacts?
Tell me why you raided Hilltop.
This Master of yours? You mean Tymofarrar?
Just stay right where you are, creature, and don't try anything!
Text: 거기 가만히 있어, 이 생명체야, 수작 부리지 마!

TextEng: Good. Then you should all be easy to kill.
Text: 좋아. 그럼 너희 모두 죽이기 쉽겠군.

TextEng: Forget it. You can rot in there, you little beasts.
I'll see what I can do, hold on.
Text: 뭘 할 수 있는지 볼게, 잠깐만.

TextEng: And why should I let you out?
Try again.
I have some questions, first.
